column4: i have a problem i have OpenGEU 8.10 and i want to upgrade to ubuntu 9.04 will my opengeu became ubuntu or it will stay with the e17
you need to wait for OpenGEU to update its repositories to 9.04
damn but i can install the 9.04 kernel ?? right just the kernel and it will be ok
you're likely to hit some dependancy problems with libc etc etc
